#germany #ge #ger #plane #aircraft #collimator #sight #userskin #usersight #rocket #rockets #wfrgr210 #50mm #410 #me410 #me410b6r3 #me410a1u4 #me410a1u2 #me410b1u2 #me410b2u4 #me410a1 #me410b1

Rocket, gun, and large caliber cannon sight for the German Me 410 series of planes. The older 30mm and 50mm posts have been taken down and combined here! The 30mm and 50mm sights have ranging out as far as I believe they would be effective. Keep in mind that taking mixed belts will let you bonk SPAA!
***Yes I am aware that the 21cm rocket sight goes onto the bezel of the gunsight. This is unavoidabl...

Если вам в падлу делать прицелы или вы просто не знаете как их делать можете обращаться.
Я открыт для ваших предложений.

Для разнообразия я могу скидывать прицелы с другими аниме персонажами, там уже как захотите.

#m3 #m3a3 #bradley #sight #sights #preset #presets

Version 1.1 Of my Abrams sight preset now with 4 versions
V1
V2 higher to center of reticle

(v1 and v2 changes)
changed range finder font to AH64
changed bullet type to type instead of short name
changed turned off gun ready reload indicator

(New)
V3 like V1 with turret rotation position farther to the right
V4 like V2 with turret rotation position farther to the right

Put inside War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

Rena Andou from girls und panzer
#rena_andou #andou #bcfreedomacademy #bcfreedom #gup #girls_und_panzer #girlsundpanzer #wtdraw #anime

Kay from Girls und Panzer
available for all tanks
HOW TO INSTALL
extracted files from zip and paste it to UserSights > all_tanks in local files game (make one if you dont have)
IN GAME
go to options > Ground vehicle battle settings > sight settings > on line "Reticle", click on first box and choose the usersight you just downloaded and remember to save before leave

Enjoy being distracted!
#Kay#girls_und_panzer#gup#sight#heart#all_tanks#anime

Some historical user-sights
#wtdraw

Updated: May 17, 2025
1. Redrawn all user-Sights using thousandth scale, so sights can be used as substitute to another vehicle with different sight magnification
2. Sighting scales are now hard-coded, immune to malforming game updates
3. Added new sights

How to Install:
1. Place the files to your WarThunder directory, make sure those .blk files are stored under 'all_tanks' folder
2. Go to Ground Battles setting > Sight setting
3. See picture 1

Sight description:
1. Panzerhaubitze 2000 panoramic
(substitute for) PzH 2000

2. Germa...

Updated version
New custom sights can now be loaded.

How to apply sights
Select ‘future’ from the presets.
Change spectator and save.

Sight colours
Open ‘future.blk’ in UserSights -> tank_sight_presets and change the colour to your preference.
The colours are composed of RGB.

Translations are used in the explanatory text.

#sight #mbt #tank #crosshair #gunsight

Modern Sights
Includes 4 basic versions and 3 requested versions
A version doesnt have the reflex laser shoot feature.

These sights are made for laser rangefinder specifically. The box around the reticle disappears when you zero any distance. They improve reflex laser shooting.


The usage is -> You see enemy far away | Aim and use laser rangefinder | Wait till the box disappears | Shoot instantly when box is gone.

#universal #modern
